item.title: Hugo Starter Kit
item.description: I’ve begun organizing resources around using the Hugo Static Site Generator. Official Resources, Tutorials, Themes, Sortcodes and More!

item.title: Static Site Generators
item.description: There are some configuration files, layouts and templates, and all of the content you create. So.. the trick is to find something that runs nicely on your system and that you can figure out how to operate. I’ll have a few general resources at the top and just add as I go, since I’m not ready to learn about too many of them, just yet.
